Aspects beast, fire

Forming the Bond While wearing the cape, you defeat a foe and spare their life.

Advancing the Bond Befriend beasts and terrify foes with your physical presence and prowess.

description.value:
Made from preserved crimson worm hide, this thick leather cape can deflect incoming blows without serious damage. It functions as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DA3HgyEBGEbtRNOo]{Dueling Cape} and while moved into a protective position, it also grants you fire resistance equal to twice the relic's number of gifts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.7dLsA9PAb5ij7Bc6]{Effect: Dueling Cape}
